text: Hey everyone, Is there a way to “mix” using a regular Dynamic page AND allow child tables? ie: row one has no child table and goes right to a dynamic page. But row 2 has a child table and therefor goes another level deep?
In the template you can check if the row has a child table and change the behavior of the page based on that

Thanks, this is my first time with HubDB. I’ve got the multilevel page working great.  Does the link you sent mention how to check if a child table is present? Do you check with something like: {% if dynamic_page_hubdb_row.child_table %} ?
Also, there will be some lower limit on the size of rich text fields, probably about 30k. It's not intended to be used as a CMS.
